data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Time::Local::2074 allows the user access to functions that override
    CORE::localtime(), CORE::gmtime(), and the Time::Local functions
    timelocal() and timegm(). The benefit of using Time::Local::2074 is
    the ability to seamlessly use dates beyond 2038, all the way out to
    2074. Time::Local::2074 seems to be a logical place for this module.
    Thank you for consideration.
